schema.name: category
schema.description: Category code associated with the liquor

schema.name: vendor_number
schema.description: The vendor number of the company for the brand of liquor

schema.name: item_number
schema.description: Item number for the individual liquor product

schema.name: item_description
schema.description: Description of the individual liquor product

schema.name: pack
schema.description: The number of bottles in a case for the liquor

schema.name: bottle_volume_ml
schema.description: Volume of each liquor bottle in milliliters

schema.name: state_bottle_cost
schema.description: The amount that Alcoholic Beverages Division paid for each bottle of liquor

schema.name: state_bottle_retail
schema.description: The amount the store paid for each bottle of liquor
